NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 AVENS: Oh, Daz! I would posit with certainty you were not expecting visitors today... Your workshop is a mess! 2 1 DAZ: Oh, goodness! When did you arrive here, Avens?! Er, I will not be taking input at this time regarding the state of my workshop. The mark of a hard worker is a messy workplace! 3 2 AVENS: I would never dispute your workaholism, my dear brother - but goodness, you must try to keep organized! How would you even know which of these scrolls have been formatted already? Allow me to lend you an appendage. 4 3 DAZ: I have an intuitive sense while working. So many scrolls are delivered to be formatted and recycled. Oh - do not leave that scroll there, please! A cyclone could sweep it into the seas while beyond the gravity pod's range. 5 3 AVENS: How have you been, Daz? How is Cassava? I heard the two of you would not be joining us at the Deep Storm Station on the day of the test. Is there.. an important reason for your absence, if I may indulge my curiosity? 6 5 DAZ: Oh, um.. Yes, there is. Please, do not tell anyone else about this, but... I'm planning to ask for Cassava's appendage in marriage at the moment of the test. I wish to spend the day setting up the perfect mood for this surprise! 7 6 AVENS: Oh my! Do you mean that, Daz? Do you plan to use... Oh, but for what reason?! Cassava is already soundly in love with you, Daz! I am sure he would accept your appendage without pause! 8 6 DAZ: I.. I can't be sure! ..And besides, I can't let the chance to have the first time-traveling marriage slip by!
